text: The capital of France is Paris.
Australia's capital city is Canberra.
The Nile is the longest river in Africa.
Mount Everest is Earth's highest mountain.
Mercury is the closest planet to the Sun.
Albert Einstein developed the theory of relativity.
Python is a programming language created by Guido van Rossum.
pandas is a Python library for data analysis.
Water has the chemical formula H2O.
Beethoven composed nine symphonies.
Amazon River flows in South America.
The Sahara is a large desert in Africa.
Venus is sometimes called Earth's sister planet.
Tokyo is the capital of Japan.
Apple Inc. was founded by Steve Jobs, Steve Wozniak, and Ronald Wayne.
Tesla, Inc. was founded by a group of engineers including Martin Eberhard and Marc Tarpenning.
The blue whale is the largest animal.
Copper has symbol Cu.
Mars is the fourth planet.
The Danube flows in Europe.
